participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Friendly and caring, always puts family first.
participant_1.background: i have three children. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i'm a plumber.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and driven, always striving for success.
participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
